alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 26 at 7:24PM CST until February 26 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 724 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 9 miles east of Vinson, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Hobart, Mangum, Cordell, Granite, Sentinel, Dill City, Lone Wolf, Gotebo, Rocky, Willow, Retrop, Brinkman and Altus-Lugert Lake. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
